Transform.label: Camera Shake (Vector Motion Blur)
Transform.tooltip:
Combines vectors from an input with camera shake vectors for motion blur;

* presets
* tiling
* pre-transform paramaters
* combining two noise patterns together i.e. handheld & vibration)
* being able to view the output curves with time offsets to place 'bumps' at the right moment in time
* seperate amplitude and frequency for Transform, scale and rotation
